alert.note: Alert for Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 1:24AM CDT until May 05 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL WASHINGTON AND CENTRAL ADAIR COUNTIES... At 124 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Adair State Park, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Stilwell... Lincoln... Adair State Park... Baron... Maryetta... Rhea... Summers... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for northeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
